data.text: @WildInUtah @SenJohnCurtis People like Kai want to be them so they don’t dare to speak out against them. Cucks make more cucks.
@SenJohnCurtis Who cares about your personal highs and lows🙄 how about a weekly report on what you’ve accomplished for the citizens of UT. You know the people you allegedly represent
@SenJohnCurtis Low: FAILING TO MAKE THE SAVE AMERICA ACT YOUR #1 PRIORITY!   @BasedMikeLee get you fellow Utah Senator on board!

@SenJohnCurtis I sure hope you’re gonna be part of the delegation to support the save act and if they want to filibuster, let them let them stand and filibuster none of this BS where they just claim filibuster and you guys walk away
@SenJohnCurtis How does Utah end up with these cucks as our representatives? We are fu****!
@SenJohnCurtis Would love for you to get aligned with your constituents who put their trust in you.

@SenJohnCurtis Please, John, Squash the silent filibuster.   So dumb, can't imagine how it got started.  Americans deserve better.  Imagine a town hall meeting debating something important in one guy says  "nah" and leaves leaving everyone hanging.  Pure inefficiency dressed as tradition.
@lisahansen42 @SenJohnCurtis Amen and Amen. This guy is a loser.

@SenJohnCurtis Dang you are almost the worst Rep a state could have.. I think you are so self consumed and not really there for the people of Utah. You seem like an idiot. Geez. How embarrassing for Utah. Trump2028
